name: Clean The Area
description:
you are the last living soldier and your mission is to kill all the zombies in each area and it will get very challenging

the game is still in development , the final and the biggest update will be in a month and you will get the game ( the update ) for free

this game contains 3 awesome levels you have a gun and bombs

use them to blow the zombies ;)

the final Update will have :

50 levels !

gun store !

different soldiers !

and keep in mind that this game made by one person only , so it is really hard especially working on the biggest update in just one month !

so please support the game !!

and please feel free to contact me for new ideas and i will definitely reply !!

yacineanes251@gmail.com
